title: EROTICA: Lesbian Romance : The Offer Box sets
description: The box sets includeThe Offer 1When Chloe gets turned down by co-worker Freya, the first person she's ever fallen for, she decides to go speed dating. Meeting Rebecca that night changes Chloe's life. Will she have the courage to make the most of this new person in her life? Or will she let her fear get the better of her?The Offer 2When Chloe gets turned down by co-worker Freya, the first person she's ever fallen for, she decides to go speed dating. Meeting Rebecca that night changes Chloe's life. Will she have the courage to make the most of this new person in her life? Or will she let her fear get the better of her?The Offer 3When Chloe gets turned down by co-worker Freya, the first person she's ever fallen for, she decides to go speed dating. Meeting Rebecca that night changes Chloe's life. Will she have the courage to make the most of this new person in her life? Or will she let her fear get the better of her?ฺBONUSWorking GirlsThe lipstick conference is the biggest annual makeup event in the industry, bringing together makeup artists from all over the country to discuss trends and new products. With so many women in one place, you can expect that they would get a little naughty. Just how naughty they do get, surprises even them…
author: J.D. Killi
